meanings.sent1: There are exactly one tredecillion stars in the universe.
meanings.sent2: The scientist calculated the distance in tredecillions of kilometers.
meanings.sent3: I have a tredecillion reasons why I love ice cream.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a tredecillion fireflies.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was overflowing with a tredecillion gold coins.

meanings.sent1: He had to wait a tredecillion years for his turn.
meanings.sent2: The library had a tredecillion books to choose from.
meanings.sent3: I have a tredecillion things to do before the party.
meanings.sent4: The crowd stretched for a tredecillion miles.
meanings.sent5: Her laughter echoed through the room a tredecillion times.
